title: Video | Olly Wilkins takes us on a tour of Surrey’s rowdiest singletrack
content:
In our first video with MBUK, Olly Wilkins takes us on an action-packed tour of his local trails in southeast England.

Mountain Biking UK’s new presenter, Will Soffe, joins Olly near his home in the Surrey Hills to check out his favourite rut-slapping tracks, before heading to the nearby S4P B1kepark for a dose of high-flying dirt jump fun.

Olly is a former professional slopestyle rider and a regular contributor to MBUK magazine, with a huge bag of tricks and an equally big smile.

This is the first edit in our new video venture with MBUK, with episodes dropping every Wednesday on BikeRadar’s YouTube channel.

Over the coming weeks, we’ll be heading to the legendary Revolution Bike Park in north Wales, finding out why Will’s mulleted all of his bikes and go shredding with the Athertons on their home tracks.

Subscribe to the BikeRadar YouTube channel so you don’t miss an episode.
author: George Scott
